sentence.Network_en: Objective To assess valueresonance imaging ( MRI ) for labyrinthitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨 MRI 在迷路 炎 诊断中的作用.

sentence.Network_en: Methods MRI findings in 10 patients ( 10 ears ) with clinically suggested to be labyrinthitis were retrospectively analyzed.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法观察10例临床提示为迷路 炎 同时存在MRI异常表现患者的MRI图像,总结其变化特征.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...但无听力障碍,眩晕常持续半个月左右,变温试验显示前庭功能减退,治愈后恢复,  ,三,迷路炎,labyrinthitis,常继发于中耳乳突炎或中耳炎,出现发热,头痛,耳部疼痛,外耳道流脓,外伤后感染损伤等,骤起的阵发性眩.
医学上来讲,严重干扰耳蜗迷路会引发内耳炎(labyrinthitis),但Jacob Kirkegaard作品的设计方式可以避免对听众听觉系统的损伤,故听众大可放心。 图2:Jacob Kirkegaard.

means.word_mean: 1. inflammation of the inner ear; can cause vertigo and vomiting

auth_sentence.content: In labyrinthitis, for example, the fluid-filled canals in the inner ear that play a vital part in balance become inflamed.
